alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Geneva, southwestern Houston, northwestern Jackson, northeastern Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Graceville, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Taylor, Slocomb, Malvern, Rehobeth, Esto, Madrid, Campbellton, Noma, Memphis, Richter Crossroads, Garretts Crossroads, Tendil Crossing, Southern Junction, Holland Crossroads, Merritts Crossroads, Keytons and Light. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
